### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (no other drill found)
-  Stone furnace at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5 y=-32.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5), boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0) and steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)

### Copper cable factory
No factory found

### Belt group at position(x=40.5 y=-83.5)
Consists of belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5) and transport belts (positions x=63.5 y=-53.5 and x=64.5 y=-53.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities
-  Make sure to provide fuel to burner entities (e.g. burner mining drill, burner inserter) before using them.
-  Ensure that the fuel is available and accessible to the burner entities.

### Errors when using steam engine
-  Make sure to connect the steam engine to a power network before using it.
-  Ensure that the steam engine is properly configured and has a power source.

### Errors when using offshore pump and boiler
-  Make sure to provide fuel to the boiler before using it.
-  Ensure that the offshore pump is properly connected to the boiler.

### Errors when using stone furnace
-  Make sure to provide ingredients to the stone furnace before using it.
-  Ensure that the stone furnace is properly configured and has a power source.

### NAMESPACE
No utility functions or variables have been defined or assigned in the given execution logs.
